We're excited to announce two major updates to enhance your experience:

ðŸ“š Third Semester Resources (CSE)

Third Semester resources have been added exclusively for CSE students!

To access them:

  • Navigate to the RESOURCES page
  • Click on the Filter icon
  • Change the semester selection to view 3rd Sem materials

âœ… Attendance Tracker Now Live!

You can now import and track your attendance!

Available for:

  • 1st Semester: All departments (AI, BT, CS, CD, CY, EC, EE, ET, AS, CH, CV, IM, ME)
  • 3rd Semester: CS, CD, CY, EC, AS

Head to the Attendance section to get started and never miss tracking your classes again!
